synopsis.text: Itâ€™s time for a new Moon Dormitory president! Hanabusa Aidou is eager to organize the election and insists on the Night Class participating in the vote. The candidates are current president Takuma Ichijou and Kaname Kuran. However, Kaname seems uninterested in campaigning, leaving Aidou to put up posters and sabotage Ichijou's propaganda. Despite Kaname's lack of effort, he even goes as far as supporting Ichijou! Who will the Night Class choose as their next leader? Will Kaname's disinterest affect the outcome of the election? The battle for the presidency is on!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
